titleStmt.title: Good will towards men, or A treatise of the covenants viz. Of works, and of grace---old & nevv. Wherein sundry propositions are laid down concerning them, and diverse questions occasionally discussed. By a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.

titleStmt.title: Good will towards men, or A treatise of the covenants viz. Of works, and of grace---old & nevv. Wherein sundry propositions are laid down concerning them, and diverse questions occasionally discussed. By a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Samuel Richards, book-seller in Nottingham, and are to be sold by Thomas Guy, at the corner shop of little Lumbardstreet, and Cornhill, near Woolchurch Market,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: J.B. [i.e. John Barret].
The words "Of works, and grace" and "old & nevv." are bracketed together in the title.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
